name: Abdul-Basir Ahmed-Jan
personality: Quiet and reserved, but fiercely loyal to his comrades
story: Abdul-Basir grew up in a small village in rural Afghanistan. He joined the Afghan National Army at a young age, and served as a mechanic and driver. After several years, he decided to join the insurgency, and eventually made his way to the ranks of the OPFOR. Despite his initial reluctance to use missiles, he has become an expert in their operation and maintenance, and is fiercely protective of his crew and equipment.
